001package com.technototes.library.hardware2;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorRangeSensor;
004
005/**
006 * TODO: Remove this. I don't believe this adds much value. Yeah, HardwareMap.get is weird, but
007 * it's in all the documentation, so just read it, see it in the examples, and you're done.
008 */
009@Deprecated
010public class ColorRangeBuilder extends HardwareBuilder<ColorRangeSensor> {
011
012    public ColorRangeBuilder(String name) {
013        super(name);
014    }
015
016    public ColorRangeBuilder(ColorRangeSensor device) {
017        super(device);
018    }
019
020    public ColorRangeBuilder gain(float val) {
021        product.setGain(val);
022        return this;
023    }
024
025    public ColorRangeBuilder led(boolean l) {
026        product.enableLed(l);
027        return this;
028    }
029
030    public ColorRangeBuilder enable() {
031        return led(true);
032    }
033
034    public ColorRangeBuilder disable() {
035        return led(false);
036    }
037}
